short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension provided for Retna users for recording user interface tests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For store owners Retna makes sure customers are having the best experience possible, to become raving fans, real time guard to make sure everything is working and get notified immediately via your preferred method when something is wrong and Identify any improvements with historical data and see your site evolve to the best it can be

For the web developer Retna allows developers to test before pushing changes to make sure your client’s site doesn’t break. Identify any performance improvements and make sure nothing is handicapping your client’s website and make sure every metric is up to peak performance.

The chrome extension for Retna makes recording tests a breeze simply click record and pretend you are a user clicking through your store.
